summary: How about I pay you some gold and you look the other way?
descriptionHtml:
First, you need to unlock perk Bribery under the speech skilltree to let the bribe dialogue show up. 

This mod makes the guards in skyrim very greedy that allows you to bribe them unlimited times, after a Successful bribe your bounty in the current hold will be cleared, also there will be no bounty limit for bribery.

Require Dawnguard, Hearthfire and Dragonbron Add-ons installed because this mod is made based on legendary edtion.
author: Reficule
